name: Reversi (APX)
overview: Reversi is a 1 - 2 player board game for the 8-bit Atari. Players take turns placing tokens on an 8 x 8 board. A player is black or white, and each piece must be played so that their is an opposing colored piece between their square and a piece already played. The player receives all pieces between their two tokens. The player with the most tokens when no plays are left is the victor. There is 3 levels of computer opponent, and the player can compete against a human or computer opponent.
